findings.title: L02. Floating Pragma
findings.description: The project uses floating pragmas ^0.8.17 which may result in contracts being deployed using the wrong pragma version, different from the one they were tested with.

findings.title: L03. Redundant Zero Address Check Before Transfer
findings.description: AirdropTokens() verifies that the recipient's address is not the zero address before initiating the token transfer, yet this validation is already conducted within the _transfer() function.
